description:
Hojo Ujimasa, the fief lord of Odawara violates orders and captures the castle of the Sanada clan, forcing Hideyoshi  to command the Tokugawa, Uesugi, and Date clans to attack Odawara.  Otani Yoshitsugu, the man who persuaded Ieyasu to join his side, visits Kanetsugu.  Otani, wounded, requests an answer ...
